title: Stadia Changelog: Chorus is the latest free demo on Stadia, Cyberpunk 1.5 update, more
content:
Google is adding another game to Stadia’s collection of free demos, with Chorus now offering a free trial on the platform. Here’s what else happened this week on Stadia.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: Chorus is the latest free demo on Stadia, Cyberpunk 1.5 update, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: If you're interested in trying out the game Chorus, but don't have any hardware to do so, Google Stadia will let you try out a free demo.
